rules: Rule1: If the material was discovered to yield the drug, then the drug is safe.
Rule2: Provided that the material was analyzed, then if the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.
Rule3: Whenever the drug is toxic, it follows that the drug is safe.
Rule4: In the event that the drug has side effects, the drug is safe.
Rule5: The drug was discontinued, or the drug is toxic, or the drug has side effects.
Rule6: If the drug was patented, then the drug was marketed.
Rule7: Either the drug was patented or the drug was licensed.
Rule8: Whenever the drug was licensed, it is not the case that the drug was rejected.
Rule9: If the drug was marketed, then the drug was not rejected.
Rule10: The sourcing is controversial, or if the sourcing is sustainable, then the drug is effective.
Rule11: Provided that a clinical trial was conducted for the drug, the results were published.
Rule12: If the drug was withdrawn, then it is not the case that the drug was recalled.
Rule13: The drug was monitored, or if it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, then the drug was withdrawn.
Rule14: If the material was synthesized into the drug, then provided that the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was tested on an animal.
Rule15: Either the material was synthesized into the drug or the material was extracted to produce the drug.
Rule16: Whenever the material was extracted to produce the drug, then if the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was tested on an animal.
Rule17: If the drug is effective, then in the event that the drug is not safe, the drug was approved.
Rule18: Provided that the material was sourced from a natural place, the sourcing is sustainable.
Rule19: In the event that the material was purified, then if the material was sourced from a natural place, the drug is effective.
Rule20: Either the material was purified or the material was processed.
Rule21: If the material was processed, then the material was analyzed.
Rule22: Provided that it is not the case that the drug is toxic or has side effects, the drug was recalled.
Rule23: If it is not the case that the approval was expedited or if the drug is not safe then the drug was approved, then a clinical trial was conducted for the drug.
Rule24: Provided that the material was not discovered to yield the drug, the drug was rejected.
Rule25: In the event that the drug is not safe, it is not the case that the drug was approved.
facts: Fact1: The material was sourced from a natural place.
Fact2: It is not the case that the drug was discontinued.
Fact3: It is not the case that the sourcing is controversial.
Fact4: It is not the case that the drug was tested on an animal.
Fact5: It is not the case that the approval was expedited.
Fact6: It is not the case that the results were published.
Fact7: It is not the case that the drug was monitored.
